name: Thomas E. PEREZ, Secretary of Labor, et al., petitioners, v. MORTGAGE BANKERS ASSOCIATION, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Thomas E. PEREZ, Secretary of Labor, et al., petitioners,
v.
MORTGAGE BANKERS ASSOCIATION, et al.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
casebody.head_matter:
Thomas E. PEREZ, Secretary of Labor, et al., petitioners,
v.
MORTGAGE BANKERS ASSOCIATION, et al.
No. 13-1041.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 16, 2014.
Case below, 720 F.3d 966.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
